description:
Embrace the magic on your next getaway! Book now your upcoming stay with us and save in dozens of destinations in Europe and the Americas.

Up to 20% discount.

5 DISCOVERY Dollars (D$) for bookings made on our website.

https://www.nh-hotels.com/en/deals/special-deal
name: Winter Hotel Offers 2025-2026

description:
Claim your season stays before it begins - reserved for those who know. Book your getaway now in dozens of destinations across Europe and Americas.

Up to 25% discount.

5 DISCOVERY Dollars (D$) for bookings made on our website.

Flexible cancellation

Terms and conditions

The offer is applicable only for new bookings made at participating hotels with the ""Special Deal"" rate, between 29.09.2025 and 31.03.2026 inclusive, for stays from 17.11.2025 to 07.04.2026.

This offer includes up to 15% savings on the best available public rates. The discount is only applicable on accommodation; the promotion is also available for bed and breakfast plans, but discount will only be applied to the room price. The discount may vary by hotel and date. The offer is subject to availability and may not be accessible in cases of high occupancy. Blackout dates and other restrictions may apply. This offer cannot be combined with other promotions.

Additional up to 10% savings are available to our loyalty programme members, exclusively on our websites and through our Central Reservations Office. To access this additional discount, enter your member details or sign up during the booking process. The additional discount is subject to availability.

Reservations with this offer can be modified or cancelled free or charge up to 7 days before arrival. If the cancellation is made after this deadline has elapsed, the hotel reserves the right to charge the total amount of the stay. Arrival check-in time should be considered at 18:00 at the latest.

Children up to the age of 11 can stay free of charge when sharing a room with a legal guardian. The maximum number of children allowed per room depends on the type of hotel and room. A supplement will be applied for children aged 12 and older.
name: Winter Promo 2025-2026

description: Destinations: Amsterdam, Groningen, Naarden, Utrecht, Zoetermeer, Amersfoort, Waalwijk, Arnhem, Rotterdam, Bussum, The Hague, Eindhoven, Noordwijk, Nunspeet (Veluwe) and Zandvoort
short_name: From € 115: one or more nights including breakfast and one 3-course dinner (per day)
name: From € 115: one or more nights including breakfast and one 3-course dinner (per day)

description: NH Rewards members get an extra 5% off when booking on our website
